description.raw:
* Initial mine \(hand-made\)
* Seven different tiles
* Not all the tiles have entries/exits in every edge, so it’s not trivial to integrate it in the cave script. Note that when there’s no tunnel in one edge, there’s disc blocking a potential incoming entry \(this will be handy if we integrate these tiles into the world generator script\).
* Added simple collision elements to the ground of each tile

For testing:

    roslaunch subt_gazebo competition.launch scenario:=mine_practice_1

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/1419797111-mine.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/856455305-mine_collisions.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3519753344-mine_inside.png)
